title: Herding Cows Tips Secrets for Happy and Healthy Livestock

tasks.task: Driving a tractor and planter
subtasks: Moving the steering wheel to control direction
Observing soil conditions and making adjustments

tasks.task: Guiding the tractor with a gooseneck hitch
subtasks: Steering while pulling a crop sprayer
Dealing with drift and ensuring coverage

tasks.task: Operating a self-propelled forage harvester
subtasks: Adjusting the machine's elevation for different crops
Managing the flow of harvest material
Dealing with bales or collected material

tasks.task: Driving a grain combine and operating rear attachments
subtasks: Using the concave and chassis to clean grain
Managing the conditioner and reel speed
Ensuring proper grain shaking and separation

tasks.task: Standing in a cornfield and cutting ears with a knife
subtasks: Holding the corn stalk with one hand
Pressing the knife into the ear of corn
Cutting the ear free from the stalk
Managing the storage or transport of harvested corn

tasks.task: Handling a bulldozer for field preparation
subtasks: Assessing ground conditions for optimal preparation

tasks.task: Using a rotary tiller to prepare soil
subtasks: Adjusting the tiller's depth for proper plowing
Managing soil disturbance and residue incorporation
Ensuring even coverage of soil preparation
Following the rows or desired path
Adjusting the tiller's angle or attachments

tasks.task: Driving a loader and bucket for field work
subtasks: Operating the joystick or lever to raise/lower the bucket
Loading material into trucks or storage areas
Stack materials neatly for easy transport
Being alert for obstacles while moving

tasks.task: Using a sickle bar mower for field maintenance
subtasks: Controlling the machine's movement through the field
Directing the discharge chute for proper material distribution
Clearing debris or sharp objects that could damage the mower
Managing the aftermath of mowing for rangeland or hayfields

tasks.task: Working with a cotton picker
subtasks: Fitting modules or carts for collection
Loading the cotton into modules or containers
Attaching straps or seals for coverage transport
Inspecting the collected cotton for damage
Ensuring modules are properly secured and ready for transport
